CHANGE LOG

Version Detail
30.04.18

Updates:

- Crosshair & crosshair attack effect now handled by client side
- Added new deathmatch score kill
- Removed set ch command
- Fixed team score when killing team mate
- Fixed player nickname
- Code improvement for stable gameplay

23.04.18

Updates:

- Fixed bot velocity
- Fixed weapon sound missing
- Improved bot character, headgear and rank
- Improved weapon configuration
- Code improvement for stable gameplay
19.04.18

Updates:

- Added crosshair attack effect & cvar
- Update Burning Hall overview

18.04.18

Updates:

- Radar overview
- Death notice background
- Fixed HUD fx
- Updated and more weapons
- Headgear system
- Code improvement for stable gameplay

25.03.17

Updates:

- Client & server integration
- Added map loading screen
- Nautilus override improvement with config file to block precache files
- New death notice UI system
- Added new sight (DrSight)
- Added two new weapons (P90 Ext. & M1887)
- Fixed p_ models
18.03.17

Updates:

- Added 2 new primary types (Primary Laser & Primary Dual)
- Added 2 new weapons (AUG A3 & Kriss S. V Batik)
- Added 2 new crosshairs type, total crosshairs 3 (default, cross, and dot)
- New bloodscreen
- Sound breath effect when you are zooming with snipers
- Hud blinking and sound heartbeating as a warning when your hp below 20
- Improved hud frag kill
- Improved deathmatch mode
- Added bomb mission hud, (buggy with c4 timer)
- Working reload parameter
- Fix laser bug
- Added aug_a3_l model
- Nautilus Override System improvement, now you can remove un-necessary cs 1.6 files such as weapon models and sounds

16.03.17

Updates:

- Initial patch

PC REQUIREMENT
CPU DUAL CORE PROCESSOR
VGA / GPU 64 MB OpenGL 2.0+
RAM 1 GB
OS WINDOWS 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
INTERNET Not Required
